task: Design and document the complete AIWG Research Framework from Inception through Elaboration phase
completion_criteria: Inception Phase Complete: intake, solution profile, stakeholders, vision, risks
Elaboration Phase Complete: UC-RF-001+, NFR-RF-001+, SAD, ADRs, agents, commands
learnings: Parallel expert teams significantly accelerate artifact creation
Gate checks ensure quality before phase transitions
AIWG patterns (agent specs, use case templates) provide consistency
Flow tracks with explicit artifacts enable comprehensive status tracking
Issues with effort estimates and dependencies support project planning
